name: Oh Crap.
description:
This is my first game jam sorry for big file pls don't kill me also I was making this in class ahahahaha

Imagine you're playing Minecraft. You forgot to build a house and it is starting to turn night. Now, you don't have any line of defense. Luckily, you ate way too many taco bells. Now you have a stomach full of ammo. Unleash your explosive diarrhea upon the zombies attacking you left and right. Controls: Left and Right to change direction | Down to crouch | Z or Space to Fire Explosive Diarrhea.
